name: appflowy
description: AppFlowy is an open-source alternative to Notion and Airtable that enables users to manage notes, documents, databases, and tasks in a secure and self-hosted way. It supports extensible Markdown editing and offline-first syncing.
features: Notion Alternative: Open-source workspace for notes, docs, databases, and tasks. All-in-one productivity.
Offline-First: Work without internet, sync automatically when connected. Never lose productivity.
Markdown Editing: Extensible editor with rich formatting and block-based structure. Flexible content creation.
Database Views: Multiple views including table, board, calendar, and gallery. Visualize your way.
Self-Hosted: Complete data ownership and privacy on your infrastructure. Your data, your control.
Cross-Platform: Native apps for desktop and mobile platforms. Work anywhere.
Customizable: Tailor the workspace to match your workflow and preferences. Make it yours.
